allow: Bash(NODE_ENV=test TAMAGUI_TEST_ANIMATION_DRIVER=css npx playwright test DialogFocusScope.test.tsx --reporter=list)

Bash(NODE_ENV=test TAMAGUI_TEST_ANIMATION_DRIVER=css npx playwright test DialogFocusScope.test.tsx --reporter=list --grep "traps focus within dialog when modal" -g)
Bash(NODE_ENV=test TAMAGUI_TEST_ANIMATION_DRIVER=css npx playwright test DialogFocusScope.test.tsx --reporter=list --grep "traps focus within dialog when modal")
Bash(NODE_ENV=test TAMAGUI_TEST_ANIMATION_DRIVER=css npx playwright test DialogFocusScope.test.tsx --reporter=list --grep "traps focus within dialog when modal" --workers=1)
Bash(NODE_ENV=test TAMAGUI_TEST_ANIMATION_DRIVER=css npx playwright test DialogFocusScope.test.tsx --reporter=list --grep "traps focus within dialog when modal" --workers=1 --ui)
